task.title: Unassign an elastic IP address using euca2ools

taskbody.context: In this section of the lab you will use euca2ools to disassociate a reserved public IP address from a specific instance.

step.cmd: Disassociate the reserved IP address from your instance.
View the public IP addresses again.

info.p: Note that the IP address assigned to your instance was unassigned and is available for assignment.
Note that the IP address assigned to your instance has changed.
